title: Vintage Basketball Pioneers
description: Dribble through the decades and remember the basketball trailblazers who transformed the game from the 1940s through the 1980s!

questions.question: Wilt Chamberlain scored an astonishing 100 points in a single NBA game in 1962 playing for which team?
Bill Russell led the Boston Celtics to how many NBA championships during his 13-year career?
Which Celtics coach guided the team through its dynasty years in the 1950s and 1960s?
Oscar Robertson averaged a triple-double for an entire NBA season in 1961-62. What was his nickname?
The Minneapolis Lakers dominated early professional basketball in the late 1940s and 1950s led by which center?
Larry Bird and Magic Johnson's rivalry began at which level of basketball before continuing in the NBA?
Which player, nicknamed 'Pistol Pete,' was famous for his flashy ball-handling and dazzling passes?
The NBA logo silhouette is widely believed to be based on which player?
Kareem Abdul-Jabbar was famous for his unstoppable signature shot. What was it called?
Before changing his name, Kareem Abdul-Jabbar was known by what name during his college years at UCLA?
The Harlem Globetrotters, famous for their entertaining basketball, were originally formed in which city?
Which Boston Celtics guard was known as 'Hondo' and played alongside Bill Russell during the dynasty years?
The ABA (American Basketball Association), known for its red, white, and blue ball, merged with the NBA in what year?
Julius Erving, known as 'Dr. J,' was famous for his spectacular dunks. He played in which league before joining the NBA?
Which point guard, known as 'The Cooz,' was famous for his behind-the-back dribbling with the Boston Celtics in the 1950s?
